basics.name: Thomas Sanchez
basics.label: Postdoctoral researcher
basics.email: firstname dot lastname at unil dot ch

work.name: Medical Image Analysis Laboratory, Lausanne University Hospital (CHUV) and University of Lausanne (UNIL)
work.summary: Working on the European ERA-NET MULTIFACT project to develop reconstruction methods and learning-based quality control techniques for fetal brain MRI.

education.institution: École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne, Lausanne, Switzerland
courses: Learning to sample in Cartesian MRI – Supervisor: Volkan Cevher
Research interests: developing acquisition trajectories for MRI using data-driven approaches; deep-learning methods and rigorous uncertainty modelling.
